resources.string: Popular Movies suggestion app developed as part of the Udacity Android Developer Nanodegree programme
A popular movies suggestion app powered by The Movie Database
Tap a movie poster on the grid view to open detailed view including synopsis, ratings, reviews* and trailers*
Use the navigation drawer to select sorting criteria
